QuestData.Title: You'll Know It When You See It
QuestData.Description: With his dying breath, Kohor mentioned the summoning of a demon that could threaten the entire region.$b$bHe may have been bluffing, but that's not a chance worth taking.$b$bThis cannot wait for the Horde's invasion of Desolace to take shape. You must scour Thunder Axe Fortress for clues and bring an end to this potential threat.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sorrem at Furien's Post wants you to find the Ancient Summoning Ritual in Thunder Axe Fortress.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Burning Blade must not be allowed to succeed with their plan!
QuestData.RewardText: It is most fortunate that you took the time to search for this.$b$bNo one would have expected the Burning Blade to be in possession of something so powerful!
